title: Fantasy Wildcards + Stack Attack, Mysterious Upside - Fantasy Football Podcast for 6/9
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason name and discuss “wildcard” players that have a wide range of outcomes. Plus, favorite stacks in fantasy football drafts, and a new edition of “Best Ball Breakdown” presented by Underdog Fantasy! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for June 9th, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit is available NOW

(03:30) - Favorite QB/WR Stacks
(10:50) - NFL News
(22:05) - Fantasy Wildcards
(22:30) - Cordarrelle Patterson
(28:00) - Kadarius Toney
(33:05) - Marquez Valdes-Scantling
(37:55) - Michael Pittman Jr. 
(42:55) - Adam Thielen
(48:35) - Elijah Moore
(54:55) - Best Ball Breakdown

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
